message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $10,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within my budget?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is the lowest I'm willing to go. This product is truly valuable and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.  What do you say?
